body_html:
@freddy Snijder - Strictly speaking about the TF CNN benchmarks, generally, for a single V100 a bs >=8, fp16 gives pretty decent gains over fp32 - at least for vgg11, inception3 and resnet*. I have seen gains starting at bs >=4 for 2 or more GPUs per server.
…
On Fri, Jul 20, 2018 at 3:45 PM Freddy Snijder ***@***.***> wrote: @rajivkapoor <https://github.com/rajivkapoor> Does the batch size typically need to be higher to get good performance when training with fp16? How much bigger? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
@Freddy Snijder - Strictly speaking about the TF CNN benchmarks, generally,
for a single V100 a bs >=8, fp16 gives pretty decent gains over fp32 - at
least for vgg11, inception3 and resnet*.
I have seen gains starting at bs >=4 for 2 or more GPUs per server.



On Fri, Jul 20, 2018 at 3:45 PM Freddy Snijder <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
